comments.author: anonymous
comments.text:
Adding miranda to the ecosystem:

**miranda** (Node.js bot + Claude plugin):
- Server: pnpm install + pnpm start
- Bot: Telegram bot token + user IDs
- Plugin: /plugin marketplace add + install miranda@miranda
- Skills: /mouse (task worker) + /drummer (batch merger)
- Dependencies: Requires ba + superego (on the server)
- Hooks: PreToolUse for notifications

This is different from others - it's a server component + plugin, not a CLI tool for local use. It orchestrates remote Claude sessions via Telegram.

title: Add datasphere:init command (ds binary install + ds scan)
Update bottle README to include datasphere
Explore how each tool installs today

comments.author: anonymous
comments.text:
Found installation patterns:

**superego:**
- Binary: brew install OR cargo install 
- Plugin: /plugin marketplace add + /plugin install superego@superego
- Init: /superego:init (detects binary, offers install)
- Per-project: sg init creates .superego/

**wm:**
- Binary: brew OR cargo install
- Plugin: claude plugin install wm  
- Init: wm init creates .wm/
- Integrates: superego's stop hook calls wm extract

**ba:**
- Binary: cargo install ba
- Init: ba init creates .ba/
- Simple, no plugin

**oh-mcp:**
- No binary: npx -y @cloud-atlas-ai/oh-mcp-server
- Plugin: /plugin marketplace add + install oh-mcp@oh-mcp
- Setup: /oh-mcp:setup (adds to claude mcp)
- Needs: OH_API_KEY env var

KEY INSIGHT: Each tool has 2-3 steps: binary install (except oh-mcp), plugin install, per-project init. All support both Claude slash commands AND direct CLI.
